description: Using tasty chicken sausages to make the meatballs and French onion soup for the sauce, you'll love having this quick weeknight pasta dish in your back pocket.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Sausage,Tree nut free,Weeknight dinner,Sesame free,Aug 2022,Budget,Quick & easy dinner,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: French Onion Meatball Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken sausage with roasted garlic & thyme
.33 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 10 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups pasta water.

Heat a large ovenproof frying pan over medium-high heat. Working with one sausage at a time, squeeze meat from the casing and shape it into rough balls. Spray with oil and fry for 8 minutes, turning frequently, or until golden and cooked through.
Stir soup mix with reserved pasta water until dissolved. Add soup mixture and pasta to the pan with meatballs and stir well to coat. Bring to the boil.
Preheat the grill on high. Scatter cheese over meatballs and pasta, season with pepper and grill for 5 minutes, or until cheese melts. Garnish with coriander. Serve.
